Posts.EditableText:
Is there any way to get this software to work on a Macbook?
I know that there's a online version but that one's missing '_attributes_' which is one of the main reasons I like Quest.

If not, is there any software that works on a Macbook that is comparable to Quest. (Especially with the _attribute_ functions).

Thanks in advance.
Posts.HTML:
Is there any way to get this software to work on a Macbook?
I know that there's a online version but that one's missing 'attributes' which is one of the main reasons I like Quest.

If not, is there any software that works on a Macbook that is comparable to Quest. (Especially with the attribute functions).

Thanks in advance.

Posts.EditableText:
There's a way to add attributes using a script. Here's a link to explain how.

https://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/tutorial/custom_attributes.html
